jawipen kadi aa radikal balawega wana peratugami samajawadi pakshayada ahasin polawata watuna meniga pasugiya janadhipathiwaranayedi sinhala jathiwadi balawegawala balapamata yatathwima nisa wame eksath apekshakayeku idiripath kirimata thibu wadagath awasthawa wamata ahimi wiyaga mewara parlimenthu mathiwaranayedi owun hasurune darunu kattiwadi rogayaka umathuweniga eksath samajawadi pakshaya ha peratugami samajawadi pakshaya athara prathipaththiyanukula wenaskam thibiyadi pawa wame chanda khediyama walakwa ganima sandaha mema mathiwaranayedi nitharanga padanamak athi kara ganima sandaha apa wisin owunta yojana karana ladiga ea anuwa disthrikka washayen khedagena tharangakara wame chanda eka godakata dama ganimata awasthawa udakara gatha hakiwa thibuniga peratugami pakshaya ema yojanawa kattiwadi lesa prathikshepa kala athara owunge idiri dakma wi thibune disthrikka 22tama tharanga kirima haraha ratapura lakhena chandayen jathika layisthu manthridhurayak laba ganime andha wishwasayayiga awasan washayen peratugamin siyalu disthrikka tharanga kirima thulin labagatha haki wuye chanda 7011k pamaniga

1814di, yang palamuwa pashanaya pilibanda grenobalhi aacharyawarayaku wu jina-franshuwa champoliyan samaga lipi huwamaru sidukale ya. 1822di champoliyan wisin file obaliskaye keti rupakshara saha grika shilalekhanawala pitapath dutuwe ya.

shri lanka nidahas paksha - eksath jathika paksha gatuma nawatha karaliyata pamina thibenne thawath deshapalanamaya thaththwayak hamuweya.eya nam shri lanka podu jana peramuna saha bahutharayak hitapu shri lanka nidahas paksha samajikayan wana shri lanka podu jana peramuna athara pawathina sambandhathawayayi.pasugiya parlimenthu mathiwaranayen pasu deparshawaya athara itha samipa sambandhathawayak athiwa thibenneyayi bahutharayakage wishwasaya bawa rahasak nowe.meyata uuna purnayak sapayanne pasugiya rajaya samaye siduwa thibena bawata chodana nagi athi wancha ha dushana sambandhayen nithiya kriyathmaka kirime arabaya eksath jathika pakshaya anugamanaya karamin sitina mrudu piliwethayi.eya kothek durata giye da yath, janapathi sirisena pawa kabinat raswimwala di eksath jathika pakshayata dos thabuwe ya.
